import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';// Create axios instance with interceptor
const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL});// Add token to requests
apiClient.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token')||localStorage.getItem('adminToken');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});// Auth API
export const authAPI={register:data=>apiClient.post('/auth/register',data),login:data=>apiClient.post('/auth/login',data),getProfile:()=>apiClient.get('/auth/profile')};// Watch API
export const watchAPI={getAllWatches:()=>apiClient.get('/watches'),getWatchById:id=>apiClient.get("/watches/".concat(id)),createWatch:data=>apiClient.post('/watches',data),updateWatch:(id,data)=>apiClient.put("/watches/".concat(id),data),deleteWatch:id=>apiClient.delete("/watches/".concat(id))};// Order API
export const orderAPI={createOrder:data=>apiClient.post('/orders',data),getUserOrders:()=>apiClient.get('/orders/user'),getOrderById:id=>apiClient.get("/orders/".concat(id)),getAllOrders:()=>apiClient.get('/orders'),updateOrderStatus:(id,status)=>apiClient.put("/orders/".concat(id,"/status"),{status})};// Admin API
export const adminAPI={login:data=>apiClient.post('/admin/login',data),getProfile:()=>apiClient.get('/admin/profile')};export default apiClient;
